entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
